Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: allowedOrigin
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: A configuration of the Access-Control-Allow-Origin response header.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: credentials
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: An indication as to whether to set the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials header.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: methods
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: An array of methods to be passed in the Access-Control-Allow-Methods header.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: allowedHeaders
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: An array of allowed headers to configure the Access-Control-Allow-Headers header.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: maxAge
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: An integer to set the Access-Control-Allow-Max-Age header. If not set, the header is omitted.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: exposedHeaders
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: An array of exposed headers to configure the Access-Control-Expose-Headers header.

Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.name: preflightContinue
Structs/Options.html#/s:10KituraCORS7Opt.abstract: A boolean that defines whether or not to pass the CORS preflight response to the next handler.

Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.name: all
Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.abstract: All origins are allowed. Access-Control-Allow-Origin will be set to *.

Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.name: sameAsOrigin
Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.abstract: Access-Control-Allow-Origin will be set to Origin from RouterRequest header.

Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.name: regex(_:)
Enums/AllowedOrigins.html#/s:10KituraCOR.abstract: A regular expression that defines allowed origins.

Enums/AllowedOrigins.html.name: AllowedOrigins
Enums/AllowedOrigins.html.abstract: A configuration of the Access-Control-Allow-Origin CORS response header.

Classes/CORS.html#/s:10KituraCORS0B0C6ha.name: handle(request:response:next:)
Classes/CORS.html#/s:10KituraCORS0B0C6ha.abstract: Handle an incoming request by setting the CORS headers in the response.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
